links.title: MSNBC's Lawrence O'Donnell: 'Donald Trump Will Be, Must Be Impeached'
links.description: MSNBC anchor Lawrence O'Donnell said Friday that President Donald Trump "will be, must be impeached because of the crimes prosecutors say he committed" in the case of his former personal attorney, Michael Cohen. "The Last Word" host noted that "nothing in the Constitution" says a president cannot be indicted, charged with a crime or put on trial.

links.title: Crystalballing with Venkat
links.description: The markets have certainly turned medium term bearish, and the bearishness has accelerated since the mid-terms as the US-China trade deal remains elusive (no surprises here though). I am still betting on SPY 255 and QQQ 152 to be reached before Dec 15.
